rows.label: tlk20010151_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My lord is like family to me.
He is kind, caring; an all-round
wonderful person.

rows.label: tlk20010151_01_msg0002
rows.name:
There's just one problem...
He's still green when it comes to battle
and fears the sight of blood.

rows.label: tlk20010151_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Kindness can be seen as weakness.
That's why I endeavor to support my
lord in whatever capacity I can.
